channel.title: security on Dominic Mulligan
channel.description: Recent content in security on Dominic Mulligan

item.title: Accepted OSCAR 2022 workshop paper
item.description: I’m delighted to announce that the abstract, “Scalable assurance via verifiable hardware-software contracts”, has been accepted for presentation at the Workshop on Open-source Computer Architecture Research (OSCAR 2022), co-located with ISCA. This was co-written with Yao Hsiao, Gustavo Petri, Nikos Nikoleris, and Caroline Trippel, with Yao presenting this work at the workshop.
